name: The Last of the star makers [DEMO]
name_original: The Last of the star makers [DEMO]
description:
Do you love the show  "Lucifer" on Netflix? Do you also love Fanfiction?

Then this is the Visual novel for you!

 The Last Of The Star Makers

AU set during the beginning of humanity- where Lucifer is the last remaining angel, after Michael turned evil, tried to take over hell and accidentally destroyed Hell, killing their family & most of humanity in the process. God, being devastated, searches for a new universe to start over.
Lucifer spends his time wandering between universes and planets, looking for anything, anyone- who might be an angel.
Thousands of years go by, and Lucifer is suddenly struck with a meteor shower while he's wandering the galaxy looking for any remaining angels. He falls down to earth, and lands in Chloe's back yard.

Note: This is only a game demo; full fic and game are incomplete!

.Exe may need to be launched twice for the game to work. 

File hosted through Google drive.

I recommend 4GB of ram, an Intel CPU with 4 cores/4 threads;  6GB of free space & a 2GB GPU.
Forums: https://tlotsm.boards.net/
